abstract: An array of shipping method objects that describe the supported shipping methods.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value is `nil`. See the following example.

Setting the shipping methods:

items.description: Configure a payment request to display a read-only pickup address on the payment sheet.
items.name: Displaying a Read-Only Pickup Address

items.description: An object that defines a shipping method for delivering physical goods.
items.name: PKShippingMethod

items.description: The type of shipping the request uses.
items.name: shippingType

items.description: A value that indicates whether the shipping mode prevents the user from editing the shipping address.
items.name: shippingContactEditingMode

items.description: A complete list of valid shipping types.
items.name: PKShippingType

items.description: Constants that indicate whether the shipping mode prevents the user from editing fields of the shipping address.
items.name: PKShippingContactEditingMode

sections.title: Setting the shipping methods and types

title: shippingMethods
